events.message: I received the wrong product and I want to return it for a full refund immediately.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
Your case has been assigned to one of our refund specialists to assist you further.
Hello! Sorry to hear about the mix-up. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the product you received along with the order number?
Sure, I have attached the photos of the wrong item and here is the order number 123456.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund immediately and arrange a pickup for the item.
Thanks for the quick response and refund initiation. I appreciate your support.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and a courier will collect the item today.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and to ensure your satisfaction.
Your case has been closed as resolved. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience.
